name: 江卓培
objective:
本課程將說明積層製造 (3D 列印) 的加工原理、積層製造系統的七大分類、每一種類的 3D 列印參數與 3D 列印結果的分析方法。對於每一種製程的設備設計思維與優缺點進行比較。提供業界的應用案例共同討論其中的關鍵技術與應用門檻。最後，進行期刊論文的閱讀與口語報告。
This course will cover the fundamental principles of additive manufacturing (3D printing), including the seven major categories of additive manufacturing systems, the printing parameters associated with each category, and methods for analyzing the resulting printed components. It will compare the design concepts, advantages, and limitations of equipment used in each process. Industry application cases will be introduced to facilitate discussion on key technologies and practical implementation challenges. The course will conclude with journal article reviews and oral presentations.
schedule:
1	The Development of Additive Manufacturing Systems
2	Classification of AM (7 types)
3,4,5 	VPP (Photo-Polymerization Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of photo-polymerization)
6,7	MEX (Nozzle type Polymerization Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of liner polymer Thermal Plastic polymerization)
8	MJT
9	BJT (Powder Fabrication Process/ Basic knowledge of metallurgy)
10	PBF
11	DED
12	Hybrid manufacturing 
13	Exam
14	Applications (Industrial, Medical, Potential)
15-18	Journal paper reading and presentation
